channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (1.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-gl-codeclimate (0.1.6)
item.description: Gitlab Code Quality artifact Flake8 formatter.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: Flake8 Type Annotation Checks

item.title: Updated: thonnyflake8 (1.0.3)
item.description: A plugin that adds flake8 to the Thonny python IDE.

item.description: A plugin that adds flake8 to the Thonny python IDE.

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (22.3)

item.title: Updated: pyproject-flake8 (0.0.1a3)
item.description: pyproject-flake8 (`pflake8`), a monkey patching wrapper to connect flake8 with pyproject.toml configuration

item.title: New: flake8-scream (0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for code that can be simplified
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (22.3.23)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-implicit-str-concat (0.3)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to encourage correct string literal concatenation.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autoflake8 (0.3.2)
item.description: Tool to automatically fix some issues reported by flake8 (forked from autoflake).

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (22.3.20)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
